help-file.title: "ANIMAL VISION"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Divination
"Animal Vision" enhances the casters vision and eyesight, allowing them to see things they would normally not. The extra visionary senses that are gained by this spell are entirely dependent upon the type of terrain it is cast within. It is rumored that this spell becomes even more potent once the caster has reached the upper levels of their craft.
